snippet: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel is visiting China amid tit-for-tat maneuvering and territorial disputes between China and its East Asian neighbors.
abstract: Defense Sec Chuck Hagel takes a two-hour tour of China's only aircraft carrier at a naval base in Qingdao, first such visit by a foreign defense official.

byline.contributor: Martin Fackler contributed reporting from Tokyo.

lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel is visiting China amid tit-for-tat maneuvering and territorial disputes between China and its East Asian neighbors.

headline.main: Hagel Receives Tour of Carrier in China Visit
headline.print_headline: Hagel Receives Tour of Carrier in China Visit
